name: sokolike
description:
A sokoban-inspired puzzle game. The art is all temporary, the mechanics are hopefully not.

This version contains 15 levels; They are not ordered by difficult and are not necessarily in the order they'd appear on the final game.

I made this as an exploration of what's possible to do with a minimal set of mechanics and level geometry. Hopefully this will serve as proof of concept for a full-length experience. I'll be adding more levels/entities as I make them, as well as updating/removing existing levels.

There's a known bug with the undo system where it just goes  completely haywire sometimes for no apparent reason.

Hope you like it! Any feedback is appreciated.
